comment.author: 46317563@N04
comment._content: The car on the left is a 1910 Reo side-entrance touring.

comment.author: 31528570@N00
comment._content: In the bottom photo, on the right, you can see the tower of the Stanford White designed Madison Square Garden, built in 1890, demolished 1925. If you look closely, you can make out the nude statue of the goddess Diana, on the very top.

comment.author: 46317563@N04
comment._content: This is the original heavier statue that was sent to Chicago's 1893 Columbian Exposition: digitalgallery.nypl.org/nypldigital/id?1691077
